lead: IFRC is a data-driven organization dedicated to making evidence-based decision-making

about.title: About data.ifrc.org
text: Data.ifrc.org is a prototype website for data and data learning at IFRC. There are upcoming projects which will feed in the coming months. Stay tuned.

fdrs.title: Federation-wide databank and reporting system
fdrs.text: The Federation-wide databank and reporting system provides data about all the National Societies.
